## Properties

| Property            | Attribute | Description                                                                      | Type     | Default     |
| ------------------- | --------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `name` _(required)_ | `name`    | Sets the related tab name, this name must match a `sage-tabpanel`'s tab property | `string` | `undefined` |
